toolset.name: ToolboxWin
toolset.tip: Ellipse tool (O)
Pointer tool (V)
Hand Tool (H)
Text Tool (T)
Rectangle Tool (R)
Line Tool (N)
Field Tool (F)
Pen Tool (P)
Import Tool
Fill Bucket (B)
Dropper (I)
Magnifier (M)
Specifies the fill of objects
Specifies the line style (stroke) of objects

toolset.name: PageWin
toolset.tip: Assigns a name to a page in a PrintDocument
Deletes the selected page
Adds a new page

toolset.name: FillWin
toolset.tip: Sets the current fill type
Selects a texture from the texture library
Allows you to enter a custom image path for a texture brush
Allows you to enter a custom image path for a texture brush
Specifies how a texture brush repeats
Specifies a Drawing2D.HatchStyle for a HatchBrush fill
Double click to set the forecolor of the hatch fill
Double click to set the backcolor of the hatch fill
Double click to set the the color of the solid fill
Specifies the gradient direction of a two color gradient fill
Double click to set the first color in a two color gradient fill
Double click to set the second color in a two color gradient fill
For custom gradients, %specifies the angle in degrees (0 - 360)

toolset.name: InfoWin
toolset.tip: Sets the units to display in the information panel
The X value at the cursor
The X value at the cursor
The Y value at the cursor
The Y value at the cursor

toolset.name: TextWin
toolset.tip: Sets the current font for text and fields
Sets unit of measure for fields. For best print results, use pixel.
Toggles font bold on and off for the current font
Toggles italics on and off for the current font
Toggles underlining on and off for the current font
Toggles strike throuh on and off for the current font
Opens the standard Windows font dialog.
Specifies the font size in current units

toolset.name: ArrangeWin
toolset.tip: Aligns to left
Aligns middles
Align to right
Align to top
Align centers
Align to bottom
Distributes widths evenly
Distributes heights evenly
Same size width
Same size height
Same size both
Align to canvas
Align to margins
Bring forward
Send backward
Send to back
Bring to front

toolset.name: StrokeWin
toolset.tip: Double click to set the color of the current stroke
Specifies the width of the stroke
Specifies the dash pattern of a stroke
Specifies the dash offset of a stroke pattern
Specifies the cap (figure) of the start of a stroke.
Specifies the cap (figure) of the end of a stroke.
Specifies the join style for figures that curve
Specifies where a stroke is drawn in %relation to the points at define it

toolset.name: ColorPicker
toolset.tip: Specifies the alpha value (opacity) of the color as a percentage
Specifies the hue value in an HSB color definition
Specifies the saturation value in an HSB color definition
Specifies the brightness value in an HSB color definition
Specifies the red value in an RGB color definition
Specifies the blue value in an RGB color definition
Specifies the alpha (opacity) level for the color definition
Previews the final color
Specifies the blue value in an RGB color definition
The final color value

toolset.name: ControlProperties
toolset.tip: Width of the new graphics surface in pixels
Height of the new graphics surface in pixels
Height of the new graphics surface in pixels
Backcolor of the surface. %This value is not exported

toolset.name: DocumentProperties
toolset.tip: Used as the default namespace for texture brushes and images that will have a runtime source of embedded.
Sets the docment's code language to Visual Basic .NET.
Sets the docment's code language to C#.
Sets the generated class name.
Sets the class wide rendering hint for text. %Effects the quality and speed of text drawing
Sets the class wide graphics smoothing mode. %Effects the quality and speed of drawing
Sets an optional member variable prefix %for exported code such as 'm' or '_'. Does not apply to consolidated objects or fields get and set blocks.
Sets an optional prefix for the generated property wrapper (get/set) block of generated fields.
Overrides all fill consolidation %(grouping of like brushes) for the document.
Overrides all stroke consolidation %(grouping of like pens) for the document.
Overrides all string format consolidation %(grouping of like string formats for text and fields) for the document.
Sets the width of the graphics class document.
Sets the height of the graphics class document.
Sets the backcolor of the graphics class document. %This property is solely to aid design and is not exported.
Generates all code and displays in a new window.
Opens a page setup dialog for PrintDocument setup.

toolset.name: ExportImage
toolset.tip: Sets the current zoom for the export preview.
Selects the format to export to.
Sets the quality as a percentage for JPEG exports.
Shows the estimated exported file size.

toolset.name: FillProperties
toolset.tip: Sets the current fill type
Selects a texture from the texture library
Allows you to enter a custom image path for a texture brush
Allows you to enter a custom image path for a texture brush
Specifies how a texture brush repeats
Specifies a Drawing2D.HatchStyle for a HatchBrush fill
Double click to set the forecolor of the hatch fill
Double click to set the backcolor of the hatch fill
Double click to set the the color of the solid fill
Specifies the gradient direction of a two color gradient fill
Double click to set the first color in a two color gradient fill
Double click to set the second color in a two color gradient fill
For custom gradients, specifies %the angle in degrees (0 - 360)

toolset.name: QuickCode
toolset.tip: Saves the generated window contents to a text file
Copies the contents of the text window to the clipboard

toolset.name: StrokeProperties
toolset.tip: Double click to set the color of the current stroke
Specifies the width of the stroke
Specifies the dash pattern of a stroke
Specifies the cap (figure) of the start of a stroke.
Specifies the cap (figure) of the end of a stroke.

toolset.name: Transform
toolset.tip: Selects the type of transformation to apply (currently only scale)
Specifies the width of the stroke
The new width as a percentage
The new height as a percentage
Enforces fixed scale proportions.

toolset.name: Options
toolset.tip: Sets the amount of undo steps to record. Adjust for performance
Toggles whether to highlight handles %as the mouse moves over objects
Toggles whether to show or %hide borders around field and text.
Toggles whether to draw sample text for fields (Sample text is not actually generated and is for layout purposes only).
Sets the default text for new fields.% You can also set this for individual fields in the property grid.
Sets the default language for new documents to VB.NET
Sets the default language for new documents to C#
Sets the default language for new documents to C#
Sets the default member variable prefix for new documents (eg "m", "_"). Does not apply to fields.
Sets the default field prefix for the property wrapper generated for fields (the get and set block) for new documents.
Sets the default field prefix for the property wrapper generated for fields (the get and set block) for new documents.
Sets the default scope of key members for new documents.%Key members are items such as the Rect defining a rectangle, or the text for a text area
Sets the default scope of the generated property wrappers for fields.
Sets the default smoothing mode for the %graphic output. Smoothing mode trades off performance and quality.
Sets the default text rendering hint for generated text.%The text rendering hint trades off performance and quality.
Sets the default consolidation for fills (grouping of like brushes).%You can override this for individual fills you anticipate programming against them via the property grid.
Sets the default consolidation for strokes (grouping of like pens). %You can override this for individual strokes you anticipate programming against them via the property grid.
Sets the default consolidation for fonts (grouping of like fonts).%You can override this for individual fonts you anticipate programming against them via the property grid.
Sets the default consolidation for string formats. You can override this for individual string formats if you anticipate programming against them via the property grid.
Sets the default runtime source for images.% The runtime source refers to how you intend to include images in your application
Sets the default runtime source for textures (images used with texture brushes).%The runtime source refers to how you intend to include images in your application
Sets the default absolute path for images.% Applicable only when the runtime source is set to an absolute path for the given image.
Sets the default absolute path for textures (images used with texture brushes).%Applicable only when the runtime source is set to an absolute path for the given texture brush.

Sets the default relative path for images.% This should be a path from your BIN directory, %and in deployment, from your application directory.%Applicable only when the runtime source is set to a relative path for the given image.

Sets the default relative path for textures% (images used with texture brushes).% This should be a path from your BIN directory, and in deployment, from your application directory.%Applicable only when the runtime source is set to a relative path for the given image.
Resets options to their defaults.
Sets the color of the major grid.
Sets the color of the minor grid.
Sets the color of margins.
Sets the color of guides.
Sets the color of the handles of selected items.
Sets the highlight color when mousing over objects on a surface.
Sets the color of points that defines curves in graphics paths.
Sets the color of the no print area or the area outside the graphics document.
Sets the 'action' color. This is the color of% bounding boxes, drawing hints, etc.
Sets the small nudge increment in pixels.%Nudging is moving items with the arrow keys.
Sets the large nudge increment in pixels.%Large nudging is moving items with the arrow keys while holding CTRL.
Sets the large nudge increment in pixels.%Large nudging is moving items with the arrow keys while holding CTRL.
Sets the snap to grid elasticity in pixels.%Elasticity refers to how close an edge needs to be before snapping occurs.
Sets the snap to guide elasticity in pixels.%Elasticity refers to how close an edge needs to be before snapping occurs.
Toggles whether or not to snap to margins.% Applicable only for PrintDocuments.
Toggles whether or not to snap to the major grid.
Toggles whether or not to snap to the minor grid.
Sets the major grid unit increment in pixels.
Sets the minor grid unit increment in pixels.
Toggles whether or not to show guides.
Toggles whether or not to show margins.% Applicable only for PrintDocuments.
Toggles whether or not to show the major grid.
Toggles whether or not to show the minor grid.
Sets the menu style to IDE
Sets the menu style to Plain
Toggles whether to show icons on menus or not
Toggles whether to show tooltips or not
Sets the application wide color picker style to the custom color picker
Sets the application wide color picker style to the Windows color picker
Enables debug tracing to help troubleshoot support issues.% Leave this off for performance reasons unless debugging
